[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@css-hooks/core](./core.md) &gt; [Config](./core.config.md) &gt; [debug](./core.config.debug.md)

## Config.debug property

Whether to enable debug mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
debug?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

When debug mode is enabled: 1. Hook identifiers (underlying CSS variables) are tagged with user-defined hook names. 2. Extra whitespace is included in the style sheet and inline styles for enhanced readability.
